block.p: American League CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Activated 3B Joe Crede from the 15-day DL.
National League METS--Activated C Mike Piazza from the 15-day DL. The Mets Claimed OF Todd Self off waivers from the Houston Astros.
INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Placed LB Rocky Calmus on injured reserve. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Placed P Matt Turk on injured reserve. Signed P Donnie Jones off the practice squad.
TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS--Signed D Brad Brown to a one-year contract.
TULSA--Suspended WR Ashlan Davis for Saturday's game at Oklahoma for conduct detrimental to the team.

TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS--Signed D Brad Brown to a one-year contract.
TULSA--Suspended WR Ashlan Davis for Saturday's game at Oklahoma for conduct detrimental to the team.
